languageKey.label: PHPIDS
Show all impacts
Clear the log table
Clear the cache table
Show settings
This shows all impacts with an impact level higher then the value you specified in the TypoScript object "Impact.db_threshold".
You can find all impacts in the logfile you specified in the TypoScript object "Logging.path".
In the TypoScript Objects of PHPIDS you can set "General.debug_mode" to true to check if PHPIDS works correctly.
This will set all DB entries in the tx_pxphpids_log table to deleted=1 and no longer show them in "Show all impacts". Are you sure you want to do that?
Successfully set all entrys in the tx_pxphpids_log table to deleted=1.
This will truncate the tx_pxphpids_cache table and delete all of its records. Are you sure you want to do that?
Successfully truncated tx_pxphpids_cache.
This are the current PHPIDS settings. You can modify them with your TypoScript Object Browser.
